title: Fourth  DC in a row
body: So I've just had my fourth game in a row where my support has disconnected due to what I can only guess is Ausfailias' disgusting internet. Four times I've had to wait from the 3min mark to the 20min mark so we can surrender. Please justify why we cant ff at any time. People just go afk anyways, so if the argument is lots of people will ff just because, well I'll argue its a damn sight better than wasting peoples time and not allowing them to just ff anyways.

replies.body:
You could try and remake matches.

The ff is delayed to 20 minute minimum due to principle reasons, as it takes in the assumption that everybody is there to play the game no matter win or loss.
But if there is a kill you cant remake
